meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lazy or idle.
meanings.sent1: Her slothfulnesses were evident as she lounged on the couch all day.
meanings.sent2: His slothfulnesses at work often led to missed deadlines.
meanings.sent3: The slothfulnesses of the cat made it the perfect companion for a lazy Sunday.
meanings.sent4: The slothfulnesses of the old car made it struggle to climb the hill.
meanings.sent5: The slothfulnesses of winter mornings made it hard to get out of bed.

meanings.definition: The act of being slow or sluggish in movement or action.
meanings.sent1: The slothfulnesses of the turtle were amusing to watch as it slowly crossed the road.
meanings.sent2: The slothfulnesses of the traffic made him late for the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The slothfulnesses of the snail racing competition made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The slothfulnesses of the river resembled the calmness of a lazy afternoon.
meanings.sent5: The slothfulnesses of the sloth hanging from the tree were mesmerizing to observe.
